name: Chitin Conquest
description:
Made solo in 72 Hours for Ludum Dare 40.

Alien gnats have infested a local shipping container terminal and have begun to breed. It is your job as an ex-military operator to exterminate the critters before an epidemic is at hand.

Playable with Keyboard + Mouse , or (a little edgy) XBox 360 Controller.

Please give comments and ratings on the Ludum Dare page if you participated, here otherwise. All feedback welcome. Don't count on any further development.

Ludum Dare 40 Entry:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/chitin-conquest

Known Issues:

  • Multiple pickups can spawn on top of each other
  • Major lag when many enemies die at once

Running Linux?
"chmod +x" the executable if it won't run automatically.
